item.description:
Sun, June 24 @ 11 am
newly restored 35mm print!
with musical accompaniment by Martin Marks

$9.50 general admission /$6.50 seniors, children, and Coolidge Members BUY TICKETS

G.W. Pabst's retelling of the tragic life and death of Lulu, the ultimate vamp, played by iconic American actress Louise Brooks in a mesmerizing performance.

Martin Marks returns to the Coolidge to perform his score for a gorgeous new 35mm print of of the film.

(1929) dir. G.W. Pabst, w/ Louise Brooks, 1h40m

This event will be hosted by Nicole, who will be holding a meetup sign at the front of the theater during the credits. Afterward, we will head off for lunch at a local eatery.
item.name: Pandora's Box at the Coolidge
